title: Fifa 20 demo release date: When will new game come out?
text:
The demo of Fifa 20 will arrive within hours, EA Sports has announced.

Players will be finally be able to play the game on 10 September, developers said.

The demo will include the new updates to the game including VOLTA Football – the mode that re-creates the beloved Fifa Street – and 11v11 Kick Off.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

EA Sports gave few details on what else would be in the demo, including which teams players would be able to use.

The release date was revealed alongside the full player ratings, which were hit by technical issues that meant they were actually delayed.

With a Fifa 20 score of 93, he narrowly missed out to his Argentine rival Reuters 3/10 Neymar Brazilian Neymar has a Fifa 20 rating of 92 AFP/Getty Images 4/10 Eden Hazard Hazard, who joined Real Madrid from Chelsea this summer, scored 91 in Fifa 20 Getty 5/10 Kevin de Bruyne Fellow Belgian has the same 91 rating as Hazard Getty Images 6/10 Jan Oblak Slovenian Jan Oblak is the highest-rated goalkeeper in Fifa 20, with a rating of 91 EPA 7/10 Virgil Van Dijk Van Dijk became the first defender to win the Uefa Player of the Year Award. He has a rating of 90 in Fifa 20 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 8/10 Mohamed Salah Salah is the second Liverpool player in the top 10, with a score of 90 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 9/10 Luka Modric Modric won the Best FIFA Men's Player in 2018 and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 REUTERS 10/10 Marc-Andre ter Stegen The German keeper plays for FC Barcelona and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 AFP/Getty Images 1/10 Lionel Messi With a rating of 94, the Barcelona legend beat Cristiano Ronaldo to the top spot Getty 2/10 Cristiano Ronaldo Is 34-year-old Ronaldo past his peak? With a Fifa 20 score of 93, he narrowly missed out to his Argentine rival Reuters 3/10 Neymar Brazilian Neymar has a Fifa 20 rating of 92 AFP/Getty Images 4/10 Eden Hazard Hazard, who joined Real Madrid from Chelsea this summer, scored 91 in Fifa 20 Getty 5/10 Kevin de Bruyne Fellow Belgian has the same 91 rating as Hazard Getty Images 6/10 Jan Oblak Slovenian Jan Oblak is the highest-rated goalkeeper in Fifa 20, with a rating of 91 EPA 7/10 Virgil Van Dijk Van Dijk became the first defender to win the Uefa Player of the Year Award. He has a rating of 90 in Fifa 20 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 8/10 Mohamed Salah Salah is the second Liverpool player in the top 10, with a score of 90 Liverpool FC via Getty Images 9/10 Luka Modric Modric won the Best FIFA Men's Player in 2018 and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 REUTERS 10/10 Marc-Andre ter Stegen The German keeper plays for FC Barcelona and has a 90 rating in Fifa 20 AFP/Getty Images

The demo had been expected to be released on 12 September, based on previous announcements. That means that players will get to have a go on the game a couple of days earlier than expected.

The full game will come out on 27 September, on PS4, Xbox One, PC and Nintendo Switch.
